languages.text: {n}Монстр направляет на вас дуло устройства, торчащее прямо из складок сероватой плоти. Его искаженный голос становится удивительно спокойным, почти нормальным.{/n} "Не надо сопротивляться. Это лишь ухудшит положение".

{n}The monster points the muzzle of a device sticking straight out of the folds of its greyish flesh at your forehead. Its angry voice becomes uncharacteristically serene, almost normal.{/n} "Do not resist. It will only make things worse."
languages.original_text: {n}Монстр направляет на вас дуло устройства, торчащее прямо из складок сероватой плоти. Его искаженный голос становится удивительно спокойным, почти нормальным.{/n} "Не надо сопротивляться. Это лишь ухудшит положение".

traits.locale_text: {n}The monster points the muzzle of a device sticking straight out of the folds of its greyish flesh at your forehead. Its angry voice becomes strangely serene, almost normal.{/n} "Do not resist. It will only make things worse."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}怪物はその灰色がかった肉のひだからまっすぐに突き出た装置の銃口をあなたの額に向ける。その怒声はいつになく穏やかで、ほぼ普通の声色である。{/n}「抵抗するな。事態を悪化させるだけだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The monster points the muzzle of a device sticking straight out of the folds of its greyish flesh at your forehead. Its angry voice becomes uncharacteristically serene, almost normal.{/n} "Do not resist. It will only make things worse."

traits.locale_text: {n}怪物はその灰色がかった肉のひだからまっすぐに突き出た装置の銃口をあなたの額に向ける。その怒声はいつになく穏やかで、ほぼ普通の声色である。{/n}「抵抗するな。事態を悪化させるだけだ」
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}眼前的怪物从灰白色肉体的褶皱之中伸出了枪口，瞄准了你的额头。它原本愤怒的声音变得异常平静，几乎没有任何波澜。{/n}“别反抗，这只会让你的处境更加糟糕。”
languages.original_text: {n}The monster points the muzzle of a device sticking straight out of the folds of its greyish flesh at your forehead. Its angry voice becomes uncharacteristically serene, almost normal.{/n} "Do not resist. It will only make things worse."

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前的怪物从灰白色肉体的褶皱之中伸出了枪口，瞄准了你的额头。它原本愤怒的声音变得异常平静，几乎没有任何波澜。{/n}“别反抗，这只会让你的处境更加糟糕。”
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}El monstruo te apunta a la frente con el cañón de un dispositivo que sobresale de los pliegues de su carne grisácea. Su voz furiosa se vuelve peculiarmente serena, casi normal. {/n} «No te resistas. Eso solo empeorará las cosas».
languages.original_text: {n}The monster points the muzzle of a device sticking straight out of the folds of its greyish flesh at your forehead. Its angry voice becomes uncharacteristically serene, almost normal.{/n} "Do not resist. It will only make things worse."

traits.locale_text: {n}El monstruo te apunta a la frente con el cañón de un dispositivo que sobresale de los pliegues de su carne grisácea. Su voz furiosa se vuelve peculiarmente serena, casi normal. {/n} «No te resistas. Eso solo empeorará las cosas».
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Das Monster richtet den Lauf eines Geräts auf deine Stirn, das direkt aus den Falten seines gräulichen Fleischs ragt. Seine wütende Stimme wird völlig untypisch friedlich, fast schon normal..{/n} "Leistet keinen Widerstand. Das macht es nur schlimmer."
languages.original_text: {n}The monster points the muzzle of a device sticking straight out of the folds of its greyish flesh at your forehead. Its angry voice becomes uncharacteristically serene, almost normal.{/n} "Do not resist. It will only make things worse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Monster richtet den Lauf eines Geräts auf deine Stirn, das direkt aus den Falten seines gräulichen Fleischs ragt. Seine wütende Stimme wird völlig untypisch friedlich, fast schon normal..{/n} "Leistet keinen Widerstand. Das macht es nur schlimmer."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Le monstre pointe le canon d'une arme incrustée à même sa chair grisâtre vers votre front.{/n} « Ne résistez pas, » {n}dit-il sur un ton anormalement serein, presque normal.{/n} « Ça ne ferait qu'empirer les choses. »
languages.original_text: {n}The monster points the muzzle of a device sticking straight out of the folds of its greyish flesh at your forehead. Its angry voice becomes uncharacteristically serene, almost normal.{/n} "Do not resist. It will only make things worse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le monstre pointe le canon d'une arme incrustée à même sa chair grisâtre vers votre front.{/n} « Ne résistez pas, » {n}dit-il sur un ton anormalement serein, presque normal.{/n} « Ça ne ferait qu'empirer les choses. »
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Canavar, griye dönmüş etinin kıvrımlarından fırlayan cihazın ağzını alnına doğrultuyor. Öfkeli sesi, karakterine hiç gitmeyen bir huzurla dolarak âdeta normale dönüyor.{/n} "Boşuna direnme. İşleri zorlaştırdığınla kalırsın."
languages.original_text: {n}The monster points the muzzle of a device sticking straight out of the folds of its greyish flesh at your forehead. Its angry voice becomes uncharacteristically serene, almost normal.{/n} "Do not resist. It will only make things worse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Canavar, griye dönmüş etinin kıvrımlarından fırlayan cihazın ağzını alnına doğrultuyor. Öfkeli sesi, karakterine hiç gitmeyen bir huzurla dolarak âdeta normale dönüyor.{/n} "Boşuna direnme. İşleri daha zorlaştırdığınla kalırsın."
traits.speaker: WrackServant
